name: FemaleDaily Network
overview:
Female Daily Network is an online destination specifically catered to women. The network owns Fashionese Daily (Fashion & Beauty), Mommies Daily (Parenting), Clozette Daily (Social Commerce) as well as Female Daily Forum. The strength of Fashionese Daily and Mommies Daily has been in their ability in combining personal point of view and traditional editorial in a reader-driven approach. The forum is where its tight-knit members interact, discuss, share insights and recommendations on everything related to women, from fashion, beauty, family, traveling, to gadgets and financial. Not only in digital world, Female Daily Network has also been engaging and empowering women through its regular offline activities and events.

With over 50,000 members, Female Daily Network is Indonesia’s largest online female community.
